body.name: Foille Medicated First Aid Ointment 1 Oz (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 5 mins
features: MEDICATED OINTMENT: Contains benzocaine and chloroxylenol
FAST RELIEF: With minor burns, sunburn, minor cuts, scrapes, insect bites, and minor skin irritations
SOOTHING TOPICAL: Stops pain on contact and allows you to resume normal activities right away
FIRST-AID: To help aid in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns
body.description: Foille Medicated First Aid Ointment provides temporary relief of pain due to scrapes, cuts, minor burns, sunburn, non-poisonous insect bites, and minor skin irritation. Its medicated corn oil-based formula contains benzocaine and chloroxylenol to help aid in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns. Foille stops pain on contact and allows you to resume normal activities right away. NDC Code: 10157-9302-4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product for burns, bites, & cuts!
reviews.reviewText: This fabulous product has been around for 60+ years. When I was a toddler I was fascinated by the flame of the hot water heater. I was looking at it one day through the little window with my little hand on the spigot which wasn't tightened down (c'mon great uncle!). I accidentally turned the hot water on. Back in the early 50's it was common to keep the water very, very hot. My back and neck was scalded. I was rushed to the local small town doctor who pealed off my clothing and applied the new product introduced to him - Foille. I have no scars and have used it all these years (I'm 64 now). I have given it to family members who have spent too much time in the sun and gotten very burned. It takes the "fire" out and promotes fast healing. Some find the smell unpleasant, but I don't. Use old clothing & bedding in case it stains.It is great for all burns, insect bites, even cuts. My cuts/burns/bites heal faster with Foille than with Neosporin or other first aid ointment.I don't go anywhere without my Foille!!

reviews.reviewText: Thank you for carrying this on Amazon! A fireman told me about this product over 30 years ago and my local pharmacies don't carry it. I always keep this in the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This ointment was introduced to my family back in Italy in 1962. My cousin burned his face when he fell on to hot stones and he was under 2 years old. My father burned his face in 1970 when the hot radiator of our car exploded on his face with boiling hot water. Each time my aunt used the ointment and neither have a scar. It is now helping my uncle who is mostly bed ridden and bed sores are kept at bay and any other abrasion of skin. Our family calls this the "Miracle Ointment". I couldn't believe it was being sold on Amazon. Worth every penny and more. I highly recommend it since I've seen the results of the product.
